channel.title: I feel like shit
channel.description:
My mother died two days ago. First, I didn't believe it, but then my father sent me a couple of pictures from the funeral.
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2ppil2g.jpg[/img]
This is her in her casket. Taken by my father today. The burial ceremony (after the blessing, I was told) happened 15 minutes after the photo. This has severely impacted my trip and stay here.
Suddenly, I don't feel so well.

item.title: I feel like shit
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Kane.:

Wow, seriously guys?

Yes.

Kane.:

Does it really bother you that much that he made a post here?

Yes.

Kane.:

That he has no other way to grieve and is confused and sad right now?

Yes.

Kane.:

Does it bother YOU that much that you must have an input of negativity that is completely unnecessary and just proves you’re an ass?

YesNo.

Kane.:

I’m so sorry dude.

lol

Read full topic

item.title: I feel like shit
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:7, topic:357847”]people need to stop whining im tired of it on a personal level

“No human thing is of serious importance" -plato[/quote]That, even if this were not a troll, who the FUCK posts about it on this forum out of all places when you KNOW everyone will make fun of you? History should have taught you this (Rictoo and his backgammon playing dad etc)

item.title: I feel like shit
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:4, topic:357847”]Wow, seriously guys? His mother just died.
The amount of idiocy here is fucking unbelievable. Does it really bother you that much that he made a post here? That he has no other way to grieve and is confused and sad right now? Does it bother YOU that much that you must have an input of negativity that is completely unnecessary and just proves you’re an ass?

I’m so sorry dude.[/quote]

Beat me to it.

Sorry dragonman, this must be terrible.

Read full topic

item.title: I feel like shit
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Wow, seriously guys? His mother just died.
The amount of idiocy here is fucking unbelievable. Does it really bother you that much that he made a post here? That he has no other way to grieve and is confused and sad right now? Does it bother YOU that much that you must have an input of negativity that is completely unnecessary and just proves you’re an ass?

I’m so sorry dude.

My mother died two days ago. First, I didn’t believe it, but then my father sent me a couple of pictures from the funeral.

This is her in her casket. Taken by my father today. The burial ceremony (after the blessing, I was told) happened 15 minutes after the photo. This has severely impacted my trip and stay here.

Suddenly, I don’t feel so well.
